prompt:
Find the smallest positive real number $C$ for which
\[\left\| \begin{pmatrix} 2 & 3 \\ 0 & -2 \end{pmatrix} \bold{v} \right\| \le C \|\bold{v}\|\]for all two-dimensional vectors $\bold{v}.$

Note that for a two-dimensional vector $\mathbf{a},$ $\|\mathbf{a}\|$ is the magnitude of $\mathbf{a}.$Please reason step by step, and put your final answer within \boxed{}.
